title: GQSP (Generalized Quantum Signal Processing)
subtitle: Preparing a simple state, cos^3(x), with Generalized Quantum Signal Processing (GQSP)
description: Implementation of Generalized Quantum Signal Processing (GQSP), which extends QSP to block-encode arbitrary polynomials of unitaries and supports Laurent polynomials. The demo implements a simple instance (state proportional to sum of cos^3) using the gqsp open-library function and Qmod phase assignment in Classiq.
